titleStmt.title: Our holy ffader pope leo that noio [sic] is considering that wher ii brethern iohn Busset [and] Richard Busset ...
titleStmt.author: Warham, William, 1450?-1532.
Catholic Church. aut

notesStmt.note: Title from first line of text; imprint from STC.
An indulgence, for contributors toward ransom for John and Richard Busset, with letter of recommendation by Archbishop Warham, dated Lambeth, 28 August 1515. A renewal of STC 14077c.124--STC.
Identified as STC 15472 on UMI microfilm; but actually precedes STC 14077c.124 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
